Description: Papyrus fragment of a letter with the start of 6 lines of Coptic text written against the fibres (verso). Photographed with EA 75328, 75327, 75326.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (118107) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/118107)
Clackson 2008 / It is our father who writes: orders from the monastery of Apollo at Bawit
